me.leoko.advancedgui.utils

Class Interaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.leoko.advancedgui.utils.Interaction

  • public class Interaction
extends Object
    This class describes an interaction between players and a layout. In most cases an interaction will only have one player. It holds some state information and is used by various components to distinguish rendering behaviour. Interactions are highly temporal and therefore not meant to keep track of any long-term state.

    Interactions with multiple players can be used so that when one player triggers an action that for example changes the view of a ViewComponent then this change is visible to all other players in the interaction.
